verbose_text: Indeed, in these experiments the kinetics of PCNA unloading closely mirror those of Okazaki fragment ligation : PCNA is unloaded by 70 min in the presence of wild-type Cdc9 (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY D), but although at 70 min replication appears almost finished in Cdc9 degraded cells overexpressing ChVLig (XREF_FIG D), significant amounts of PCNA remain on chromatin (compare XREF_FIG G with XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY D).
